means: 以印度大麻提炼的麻药

word_mean: 印度大麻：一种纯真的树脂制品，收取于栽培的雌性大麻(Cannabis sativa )雌性花顶的未掺杂制品，可以作烟吸，也可口嚼，以产生陶醉效应
其作用比大麻(marihuana)更强。见cannabis项下

sentence.Network_en: He bought some roach clips and hashish pipes at the head shop.
sentence.Network_cn: 在麻药品店里他买了些蟑螂夹子和烟管.

sentence.Network_en: The active ingredient, tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ), makes up 10 - 15 % of hashish.
sentence.Network_cn: 其中的有效成分四氢大麻酚 ( THC ) 占哈希什的10～15%.

sentence.Network_en: Ah, yes, the hashish is beginning its work.
sentence.Network_cn: 啊, 啊! 大麻终于起作用了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Arabic ḥas̆īs̆ 'dry herb, powdered hemp leaves'

entry.tran: 大麻麻醉剂，哈希什（一种毒品）
entry.def: Hashish is an illegal drug made from the hemp plant which some people smoke like a cigarette to make them feel relaxed.

means.word_mean: 1. purified resinous extract of the hemp plant; used as a hallucinogen
